email_body:
Dear Jennifer Singer,

We have identified a critical security vulnerability in our organization's systems and it requires your immediate attention. As a DevOps engineer and leader of the engineering team at SafeSecurity, your expertise is crucial in resolving this issue.

To address this security concern, we have implemented a new security protocol and it is vital that you update your system immediately. Please click on the following link to download and install the required security patch:  Click here 

Once you have completed the update, please inform Lars Treble, Patricia Gardi, Josephine Baldi, and Ray Levinson to do the same, as they are also responsible for maintaining the security of our systems.

If you have any questions or require assistance during the update process, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Gale Robinson
